oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lefaucheux revolver found at Parker's Crossroads
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: French-made 6-shot nonpercussion revolver found in the woodline in sandy soil on the Parker's Crossroads battlefield around 1970-1. A military issue sidearm often associated with Midwestern Federal cavalry units in the Western theatre, 12,000 Lefaucheux were ordered for use by the Federal cavalry.
